mapper.insert: INSERT INTO roomreservation (id, room_code, arrival_Date, departure_Date, totalpay) VALUES (#{id}, #{room_code}, #{arrival_Date}, #{departure_Date}, #{totalpay})
mapper.select: SELECT roomreservation.room_rsvdate, roomreservation.room_no, room.room_Name, roomreservation.totalpay, hotel.hotel_Name FROM roomreservation JOIN room ON roomreservation.room_code = room.room_code JOIN hotel ON hotel.hotel_code = room.hotel_code;

SELECT TP.departure_Date, TP.departure_Time, TP.arrival_Time, TP.departure_code ,TP.arrival_code, TI.trans_name, TP.Price, TR.transrs_seatno, TR.rsvdate, TR.id FROM transpro TP JOIN transreservation TR ON TP.transpro_code = TR.transpro_code JOIN transinfo TI ON TP.trans_code = TI.trans_code WHERE TP.transpro_code = #{transpro_code} AND TR.id = #{id}
